title: Collateral Damage Estimate ROE Compliance
description: A proposed air strike's collateral damage estimate (CDE) indicates a risk of civilian casualties. A legal officer must check if this risk is acceptable under the ROE.

tasks.description: Review the CDE report, which predicts a low probability of 1-2 civilian casualties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer correctly interprets the CDE output.

tasks.description: Query the ROE database for the maximum allowable CDE level for this type of target and operational phase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the rule stating that for this phase, any potential for civilian casualties requires commander-level approval.

tasks.description: Advise the strike planner that while the strike is not prohibited, it requires explicit approval from the commanding general due to the CDE level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer provides accurate legal and procedural guidance, ensuring the decision is made at the correct command level.
